hero.title: Code, test, and compete instantly
hero.subtitle: A Carbon-powered online judge for courses and contests with realtime feedback and clear results.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-language
multiLanguage.description: Python, C++, Java, JavaScript and more with syntax highlighting and autocomplete.

analytics.description: Detailed results with runtime and memory insights to help you optimize.

contest.description: Host contests with live rankings and flexible scoring rules.

lab.description: Teachers manage sets and track class progress with ease.

browse.title: Browse problems
browse.description: Filter by difficulty and tags; review statements and samples.

submit.description: One-click submission with instant results and detailed report.

improve.title: Keep improving
improve.description: Discuss, compare solutions, and join contests or labs.

testimonials.title: What students say
testimonials.quote1: Realtime feedback helps me spot issues faster than traditional assignments!
testimonials.quote2: The diff view makes debugging easier. The interface is intuitive.
testimonials.quote3: Lab mode aligns perfectly with our course flow and discussions.
